California Fruit Canners Association. California Fruit and Vegetable Products with Recipes for their Use. San Francisco, CA: California Fruit Canners Association, 1915.
Del Monte; California Packing Corporation. Conklin, Hester M., and Pauline D. Partridge. Del Monte Recipes of Flavor. Sixth edition. San Francisco, CA: California Packing Corporation, 1923.
Del Monte; California Packing Corporation. Conklin, Hester M., and Pauline D. Partridge. Del Monte Recipes of Flavor. Publication No. 610. San Francisco, CA: California Packing Company, circa 1930.
National Canners Association. Harland. The Story of Canning and Recipes. Place of publication unknown: National Canners Association, 1910.

Del Monte; California Packing Corporation. The Del Monte Fruit Book: A Picked Collection of Recipes Covering the Best & Most Practical Service of Canned Fruits for Every Occasion. First Edition. San Francisco, CA: California Packing Corporation 1924.

Del Monte; California Packing Corporation. The Del Monte Fruit Book Containing the Favorite Fruit Recipes of America's Best Known Cooking Authorities. Fourth edition. San Francisco, CA: California Packing Corporation, 1929.

Del Monte, California Packing Corporation with Hester M. Conklin, Pauline D. Partridge. Del Monte Tomato Sauce Recipes: A Book of Over 100 Practical, Economical And Conveniently Made Dishes For All Occasions, Illustrating the Wide Usefullness And Almost Unlimited Possibilities of Del Monte Tomato Sauce in the Improvement of Every-Day Cooking. San Francisco, CA: California Packing Corporation, 1925.
